item.description: What better way to CELEBRATE 2009 than with you furry friends! Bring your dogs to a meet up group! Our indoor facility provides a great place for all dogs to romp and play. We provide toys, water, and clean-up. For your dogs to socialize, where you can make human friends too!
item.how_to_find_us: Check in at the front desk. Meet up will be in the daycamp room.

group.name: The Rocky Hill "All Breed" Meetup Group

item.name: New Year's Meet-up!
